quotes.quote: Mastermind and collaborate with other smart entrepreneurs if they have futures that are even bigger than their present.
The mastermind, the man with the plan.
The mastermind principle cannot obtain where perfect harmony does not prevail.

To think health when surrounded by the appearances of disease or to think riches when in the midst of the appearances of poverty requires power, but whoever acquires this power becomes a mastermind. That person can conquer fate and can have what he or she wants.
There's a magic that comes from playing entirely to who you are. I've got my specialist subject - in the Mastermind sense - and I wouldn't change it, or who I am.
My dad is a marketing mastermind.
Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
Everyone is born a genius, but the process of living de-geniuses them.
Genius... is the capacity to see ten things where the ordinary man sees one.
The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
There is no great genius without a mixture of madness.
Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex… It takes a touch of genius – and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
Hear genius hear thy children's cry not always should thou love to brood.
Hear genius hear thy children's cry not always should thou love to brood.
Where seas of sand toss their hot surges high nor genius should the midnight song.
Ah linger not to hear the song genius avenge thy children's wrong.
Who in a troubled world unjust and blind bears genius treasure of celestial birth.
Pursue the son of genius he will rise.
Command the roof great genius and from thence into this house pour down thy influence.
Conversation with a genius like mountains on his brow laurels of praise.
Genius a hundred generations have gone into its making with all their love and tenderness.
Do I believe sayest thou Genius what the masters of wisdom would teach me.
Beyond genius the spirit flies, beyond genius the mood decries.
Beyond genius the heavens sing beyond genius that final thing.	Beyond genius the heavens sing beyond genius that final thing.
Genius feels no dread within his heart at the tempest nor the rain.
Nature glows in every classic line still genius dictates still the verse is thine.
Taste is a rare to be found as a true genius. That most men are born with some taste.
The honors due to real genius share.
